resources.string: Thank you for using Simple Notes.\nFor more simple apps please visit SimpleMobileTools.com.\n
A note with that title already exists
Are you sure you want to delete note \"%1$s\"?
Pick a note for the widget
More simple apps and source code at:\nhttp://simplemobiletools.com
Send your feedback or suggestions to:

string.name: rate_us_underlined
string.u: Rate us in the Play Store
